[[module CSS]] #header, #page-title, #side-bar { display: none; } #main-content { float: center; margin: 0 auto; } div#container-wrap { background: none; } [[/module]] [[module CSS]] #license-area { display: none; } #footer, .options { color: transparent; background: transparent; font-size: 0em; } #page-options-container { display: none; } .page-tags { display: none; } /* TABLES */ table, table.wiki-content-table th, table.wiki-content-table td { border: 1px solid var(--color-mn); background: transparent; } /* Ruby by Nanimono Demonai */ .ruby, ruby { display: inline-table; text-align: center; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1; height: 1em; vertical-align: middle; } .rt, rt { display: table-header-group; font-size: 0.6em; line-height: 1.1; text-align: center; white-space: nowrap; } [[/module]] [[html]]
